name: Piggy&Shovel
description:
Piggy has a new challenge. This time demon monsters attacked him while he was collecting some truffles in the forest. He has found the magic Shovel, which can speak and even something more, if you give it a truffle. Magic Shovel is fond of truffles and Piggy can find them. Shovel can attack and Piggy can only run. The point is, they have to work TOGETHER to survive! Help Piggy to get through this.

WASD – Movement 

Hold E – To Dig 

Left Click – To Fire

You have only 1 life
Max amount of truffles is 3 
Dig truffles to fire monsters.
Kill 20 monsters to win
